properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 9:31AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the lower Black Warrior River...but levels
are now beginning to fall along the upper portions ofthe river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  9:15 AM Wednesday the stage was 101.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 104 feet by
Friday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 105 feet...Severe residential flooding occurs in the
area...and evacuations may become necessary. Widespread flooding of
lowlands in the area will continue the next several days.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
